Reviews.Title: Focus Camera sells used Camera for new...
Reviews.Author: Mammad Barghi
Reviews.Content: First I bought a Sony A65 from Focus Camera that was missing some stuff, so I returned it right away. Few days later, I bought the Sony A77 from them (Focus Camera) and it was like the same. They sold me a used camera for the price of a new camera! I wrote a review, but for some reason it's not there anymore...Joyce from Focus Camera called me and left a message saying "call us back so we can see why you didn't like the camera." So I called and though they were going to say sorry for the inconvenience, send your camera back and we'll send you a new one, but what they said was "the camera is new!" I told them it was missing the golden sticker that all the new Sony DSLR's have and the plastic wrappers where missing for the USB cables and other things. She didn't give a F***!! She just said "no no, it's new, good bye!" Worst customer service every!I would avoid Focus Camera because of this crappy customer service and product quality! Selling used S***t for new!

Reviews.Title: Image quality simply fantastic
Reviews.Author: Cristian Fiedler Seebach "C.Fiedler"
Reviews.Content: From day 1 I started enjoying this fantastic camera. Many users, including myself, are reluctant of the Electronic Viewfinder. Honestly, in this camera, this Electronic Viewdinder is really a piece of good engineering Prici / Quality is EXCELLENT
